Issue.creator: mastersingh24
Issue.summary: Modify comm implementation is use callback function to get secure dial options
Issue.description: The current gossip implementation is initialized with a set of dial options which don't change during the lifecycle of the peer. In order to always get the most up to date secure dial options (which basically means dial options with the latest set of trusted roots for remote peers / organizations) this task will add a callback function to the comm impl
